## Ignore Visual Studio system files
.vs/
*.user
*.suo
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

## Build Output
bin/
obj/
Debug/
Release/

## Visual Studio cache
*.ide
*.ncb
*.aps
*.cachefile

## NuGet packages
*.nupkg
*.snupkg
packages/
project.lock.json
project.fragment.lock.json
artifacts/

## ASP.NET Core
appsettings.Development.json
appsettings.Local.json
appsettings.*.json
*.db
*.sqlite
*.mdf
*.ldf
*.log

## Backup & Auto-generated files
*.bak
*.tmp
*.temp
*.swp
*.swm

## Resharper / Rider
.idea/
*.DotSettings.user

## Node / Frontend (if any)
node_modules/
dist/
npm-debug.log
yarn-error.log
*.bundle.js
*.map

## Publish output
wwwroot/
*.pubxml
publish/

## Others
Thumbs.db
.DS_Store
